name: Bishops of Cherson in Crimea: Basil, Ephrem, Capiton, Eugene, Etherios and others
troparia: (Tone 4) God of our fathers, You always treat us fairly.* Deprive us not of Your mercy,* but by their prayers direct our lives in peace.
kontakia: (Tone 2) The day of splendor of those brilliant bishops of Cherson has come today.* We are singing for the feast of those shepherds who died for the sheep of Christ.* O princes of shepherds and martyred priests,* beg Christ to put us with the sheep at his right hand* so that we may sing out to you:* Rejoice, O priestly fathers who poured out your blood for Christ.
